title: Annoying Prompt Every Time I Log In To LOL - Season Rewards Announcement
body:
Hi guys,

Please advise how I can dismiss the attached "Season Rewards Announcement". I see it every time I log in to LOL... for the last year... Now it just says 2015 instead of 2014... It's really getting on my nerves.

Thanks!

replies.body:
login on a differant pc makes it happen 
static ip / ip changing also makes it come up.

> [{quoted}](name=GOA Yeahman,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7hh08Ed0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-08T15:33:32.726+0000)
>
> login on a differant pc makes it happen 
> static ip / ip changing also makes it come up.


Thanks for the ideas.
I'm on cable and the IP changes about once every 6 months, and I've been using the same computer for 9 months now, so unfortunately I don't think it's either of those. It's coming up *every* time I log in. Actually, the only time I don't see it is if someone has left me a positive game vote in the game after I've already quit lol.
